pages.text:
$
$
$
About Us
/$
$
/$
$
Welcome to Tarbenders, where flavor, creativity, and community come together in a one-of-a-kind experience. What began in 2014 as a vibrant catering business grew into something even more special when we opened our brick-and-mortar location in 2018. Nestled in the heart of Leesburg, our cozy speakeasy is full of character and charm— offering much more than just delicious drinks and bites.
​
Through the challenges of the pandemic, we didn't just survive— we evolved. Today, we proudly serve
creamy, house-made gelato by day
, creating a warm, welcoming space at the front of our hidden gem.
Step through the secret door, and you’ll find a laid-back speakeasy buzzing with energy, crafted cocktails,
and unforgettable flavors.
Our menu is a true labor of love—crafted with care by owner and chef Paul Zangos, and paired perfectly with expertly mixed drinks by his wife Lindsay and our amazing team. Whether you're here for a casual night out, a unique date spot, or to sing your heart out at karaoke, Tarbenders is your home away from home.
​
Come join us—experience the flavor, feel the vibe, and be part of the Tarbenders' story.
/$
/$
$
$
Tarbenders' Team
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
Owner
/$
$
Paul Zangos
​
"Tarbenders was a dream of mine that became a reality in 2018. I built this to feel like a getaway, like a vacation to a different era."
​
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Owner
/$
$
Lindsay Zangos
​
"We love what we do and we appreciate everyone that helps keep our dream alive. Tarbenders has also been a way to give back. After our daughter was in the NICU at Children's Hopsital, we donated to them and many other charitable organizations that need support."
​
/$
$

Social Media
/$

/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Website and Calendar Guru
/$
$
Sara
"Website and calendar upkeep? Ain't nobody got time for that... except me :)  My parents had small businesses when I was growing up, so I know how hard it is to try to keep track of every little detail. Paul and Lindsay are working their butts off... and I support that hustle. Livin' the dream!"
/$

Come meet your Tarbenders at Leesburg's finest bar & lounge - Excellent food, expert service & swanky ambiance at Tarbender's! Lounge!
